ygData.subject: Re: New Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone know what color robes there are and where to get them?  i m trying to start a collection, i want a wardrobe.  :) ... From: Lomack
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone know what color robes there are and where to get them? i'm
trying to start a collection, i want a wardrobe. :)


----- Original Message -----
From: Lomack <lomack@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>; <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 12:10 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: New Robes


> From: Lomack <lomack@...>
>
> Gack, thanks. I looked all over the Main spell shop. I guess its
possible
> that I missed them. Looks like I am headed back to Ak. Well I'm almost
> 16th (half way through 15th) so i guess I will wait till then.
>
> If they were in another part of the city please let me know so I don't
have
> to go all over the place. Double thanks.
>
> Lomack
>
> >Message: 13
> > Date: Thu, 29 Apr 1999 14:58:01 -0700
> > From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> >Subject: Re: New Robes
> >
> >I am a gnome wizard also... I am wearing the Senior Apprentice robes
that I
> >bought in Ak'Anon...
> >
> >Drev
> >
> >> ----------
> >> From: Lomack[SMTP:lomack@...]
> >> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> >> Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 2:46 PM
> >> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> >> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: New Robes
> >>
> >> From: Lomack <lomack@...>
> >>
> >>
> >> >Message: 25
> >> > Date: Thu, 29 Apr 1999 07:50:50 -0400
> >> > From: "Stefan Raets" <SRAETS@...>
> >> >Subject: New Robes
> >> >
> >> >Does anyone know if I can buy a new set of Wizard's Robes in Freeport?
> >> >I'm in Rivervale now, and none of the shops seems to be selling robes.
> >> >I know I can find them in Erudin, but that's a long trip, and I think
> >> >Freeport is just a bit closer. I don't care about the color (although
> >> >I prefer the red ones from Erudin). I just need robes that will fit
> >> >an Erudite.
> >> >
> >> >Aznyin
> >> >Level 12 Erudite Wizard
> >> >Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
> >>
> >> Yes you can get robes in Freeport. They sell two types one is Jr.
> >> Apprentice Robes and the other are Sr. Apprentice robes. I think the
Sr
> >> ones cost just under 5 plat but have an AC of 6 and also give some
mana.
> >> Not much but something is better than nothing.
> >>
> >> The kicker of it is that I am a GNOME. I have been to every city.
Even
> >> the Troll and oger city with other characters. There re NO Gnome sized
> >> robes. Not even in Ak'Akanon. I lost my guild robe when I was first
> >> starting out.
> >> Granted my Cloth Tunic has a better AC but I still would like to have a
> >> robe, even if its just for show. Has anyone found a Gnome Sized Robe.
> >> Actually I think they sell one for Magicians Only in Freeport that a
Gnome
> >> could wear, but that kind a leaves my Wizard out of the picture......
> >>
> >> Lomack
> >> Curse those Racist apparel makers :)
> >>
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
